TextView.android:text: This policy sets out how we collect, process and hold your data if you visit our app or otherwise provide personal data to us. \n\nThis policy affects your legal rights and obligations so please read it carefully. If you have any questions, please contact us at help@ddxr.in

The privacy terms apply to and govern the data collection and usage. It is also applicable to the ways in which we protect your personal information. 

DDXR is committed to protecting your privacy to give you the safest online experience. 

DDXR collects personally identifiable information, like the e-mail address, name, address, contact information and other aggregated data generated by our system as it tracks traffic through the app. 

The personally identifiable information is collected to deliver the services you have requested for and to provide customer support. DDXR does not sell, rent or lease the customer information to the third-parties. 

We may share the collected information with event management/organizer/promoter as necessary for the purposes of the event. We will not share the information for marketing and promotional purposes without your consent (as part of booking process or otherwise). 

No disclosure of personally identifiable information is undertaken by DDXR, without notice, only if required to do abiding the law or in good faith if such action is necessary to protect and defend the rights or property of DDXR. 

We collect, process, store and use personal data when you authorize us to see your personal details after you login on our platform directly or through third party login system. 

If you are an event organizer, we collect additional necessary data from your end. 
Additional Data such as your name, your organization name, your event details and contact information is recorded with us. This information is also visible to people who are interested in your event or purchase tickets to your events. 

When an organizer activates ticketing on our platform, we may also collect your financial information from you, for example your bank account information or your paytm account information. 
We only use your financial data as far as transfer of funds is required. We never store or sell your financial data to anyone. You have the right to delete your organizer account as and when you require, unless in case a payment issue or a fraudulent matter appears.

If you are a consumer or an event attendee or someone who uses DDXR.in to discover events and get tailored event recommendations or if you login on our app, we collect additional data from your end such as your name and contact information. 
This additional data is mostly used for our own purposes. However, when you register for an event through DDXR.in or buy tickets for paid events, we collect that data on behalf of the event organizer and do not store it for more than 6 months. The period of 6 months is taken into consideration to solve payment or registration related disputes if it happens. 
As a consumer, when you fill an event inquiry form or enter a coupon code or buy tickets or contact the organizer through our system, your contact details are shared with the organizer to help organizer identify you and reach you for any communication related to that event or for their upcoming events. 
When you interact with organizers/users through our chat feature or through our chat plugin on any app, you will be introduced to organizer with your email id to better connect with you and provide you with the service/support that you were expecting from them. 

We may change the terms of this policy from time to time. You are responsible for regularly reviewing this policy so that you are aware of any changes to it. If you continue to use our app after the time we state the changes will take effect, you will have accepted the changes.
For terms of service of our app, refer to the Terms of Service section of our platform.

General Terms And Conditions For Ticketing:

Payment: All payments through our ticketing services are made directly to the organizers. It is advisable that the user verifies the availability, authenticity and safety of the event. The ticketing services are provided only as an added convenience for the users and DDXR does not verify the events and the payments made.

Liability of refund for cancellation of the events: All the events listed on DDXR are posted by the organizers. All tickets sold through DDXR are created, priced and handled by the organizers themselves. The transaction of fund for tickets are directly made to the organizer's account. The organizers are liable for refund of the amount for the ticket in case of any cancellation of the event. DDXR is in no way responsible for any such disputes
Platform access restrictions: DDXR reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to terminate the access to the app and the related services or any portion thereof at any time, without notice.
Control over the ticketing service: DDXR does not control the availability of tickets, pricing and authenticity. The users are hereby advised to verify the same at their own discretions.

Event restrictions: Please check the restrictions for admission rights into the events by the organizer, like age, dress code etc. before buying the tickets. The organizer reserves all rights to allow participation in their events.
Billing and delivery: The billing and delivery of tickets will be done by the organizer and will not be handled by DDXR. Please contact the organizer directly in case of any issues.
Modification of terms and conditions: DDXR reserves the right to change the terms and conditions at its own discretion. We are not liable to notify the users once the changes take effect.

Abiding by the age restrictions is mandatory, which applies to the venue where the event is being conducted. We shall use reasonable efforts to provide details of age restrictions, but it should be your responsibility to know the age parameters which are applicable to the entry
